parameters.label: Country
parameters.description: Select a country to set model parameters for country-specific demographic, mixing and economic data.

parameters.label: Disease
parameters.description: Select a disease to set model parameters for transmissibility, delays, and severity based on known characteristics of that historical epidemic or epidemic wave.

parameters.label: Response
parameters.description: Select a pandemic mitigation strategy, comprising closures and other restrictions

options.label: No closures
options.description: No pandemic mitigation: all economic sectors are fully open

options.label: School closures
options.description: A response strategy of mostly school closures

options.label: Business closures
options.description: A response strategy of mostly economic closures

options.label: Elimination
options.description: A response strategy aimed at elimination of the disease, including all necessary closures

capacities.label: Hospital surge capacity
capacities.description: Number of hospital beds available nationally for pandemic patients

interventions.label: Pandemic response
interventions.description: National response to pandemic, including closures and social distancing.

time_series.label: Prevalence
time_series.description: Number of infectious individuals, comprising both symptomatic and asymptomatic infections, including those in need of hospitalisation.
